column2: ENGLISH

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] now leads the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], but our allegiance was to the [former_khan.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan and not to the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan. Perhaps it is time for the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] to strike out on its own and seek its own fortunes...
We will not follow [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]!
No, [From.GetSheHe] is the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], at least for now

Dire news: [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has elected to split off from the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], citing that [From.GetHerHis] allegiance was to the [former_khan.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan and not to your own.
[From.GetSheHeCap] shall soon learn the error of [From.GetHerHis] ways...
The Death of [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]

While [nomadic_first_heir.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is widely recognized as [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s chosen heir, there is also widespread support amongst the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan for [nomadic_second_heir.GetFirstName]. With the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] having grown so large, some [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] warriors have declared they will follow him into a new clan.

While [nomadic_first_heir.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is widely recognized as [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s chosen heir, there is also widespread support amongst the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan for [nomadic_second_heir.GetFirstName] and [nomadic_third_heir.GetFirstName]. With the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] having grown so large, some [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] warriors have declared they will follow them into new clans.

While [nomadic_first_heir.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is widely recognized as [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s chosen heir, there is also widespread support amongst the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan for his other sons: [nomadic_second_heir.GetFirstName], [nomadic_third_heir.GetFirstName], and [nomadic_fourth_heir.GetFirstName]. With the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] having grown so large, some [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] warriors have declared they will follow them into new clans.
They would split [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] apart?
I will take my place as a new leader
Such is how it must be
Perhaps this will finally weaken them

Now that I am the head of my own clan, I must consider whether I wish to remain in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] under the leadership of my brother. If I split off, it is possible that other clans might choose to join me...or I could be completely on my own.
I will forge my own destiny
I will remain in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], at least for now

To my liege and [GetFromRelation],
A number of clansmen from the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan have joined my ranks, and I have decided to split off from the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] and forge my own destiny.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]

The [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan has decided to split off from the [nomadic_first_heir.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and since your lands border my own I invite you to join us in forging a new destiny.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
Yes, we will join him
No, we will remain in [nomadic_first_heir.PrimaryTitle.GetName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle],
My clan has decided to join yours in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Together we shall make our enemies tremble!

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle],
My clan has decided to follow [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] into the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. We wish you well, and hope that [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] watches over us both.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle],
Your decision to leave the [nomadic_first_heir.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is yours to make, but we will not join you.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
With the province of [surrendered_county.GetName] cut off from the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], [liege_gaining.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s clan has moved in to assume control.
With the province of [surrendered_county.GetName] cut off from the [liege_losing.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], our clan has moved in to assume control.
With the lands of [surrendered_vassal.GetTitledName] cut off from the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], [liege_gaining.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has become [surrendered_vassal.GetHerHis] new liege.

With the lands of [surrendered_vassal.GetTitledName] cut off from the [liege_losing.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], [surrendered_vassal.GetSheHe] has fallen under the control of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan and is now your vassal.
